artist: Edvard Munch; Printer: M. W. Lassally, Berlin
creditline: The Miscellaneous Works of Art Purchase Fund, 1957
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, LR, below artist's signature: Lassally 1906-9
medium: Lithograph in blue ink on Japan paper
provenance: Harald Holst Halvorsen (Kunsthandel, Oslo, Norway). [Richard H. Zinser, Forest Hills, New York, until 1957; sold June 14 for $1, 450 to Mia]
signed: Signed LR in pencil: Edv Munch
title: Separation II
